# RateMyBaliBuilder

> RateMyBaliBuilder is a community-driven platform for finding and reviewing builders, contractors, and tradespeople in Bali, Indonesia. Search verified reviews to find trusted professionals and avoid scams before starting your construction project.

RateMyBaliBuilder helps expats and locals make informed decisions about hiring construction professionals in Bali. Our database includes ratings, reviews, and scam warnings from real clients.

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/): Search for builders by name or phone number
- [Browse Builders](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/builders): Complete database of all builders with filters
- [Add a Builder](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/add-builder): Submit a new builder to the database
- [Submit Review](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/submit-review): Share your experience with a builder
- [About](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/about): Learn about our mission and verification process
- [Contact](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/contact): Get in touch with our team

## Find by Trade

- [Find a General Contractor](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/general-contractor): Villa and home construction managers
- [Find an Architect](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/architect): Tropical home design professionals
- [Find an Interior Designer](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/interior-designer): Bali interior specialists
- [Find a Pool Builder](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/pool-builder): Infinity pool and pool construction
- [Find a Renovation Specialist](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/renovation-specialist): Villa renovation experts
- [Find a Mason](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/mason): Stonework and brickwork craftsmen
- [Find a Roofer](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/roofer): Thatch, tile, and metal roofing
- [Find a Plumber](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/plumber): Water systems and septic installation
- [Find an Electrician](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/electrician): Electrical and solar installation
- [Find an HVAC Specialist](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/hvac): Air conditioning installation
- [Find a Welder](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/welder): Gates, railings, and metalwork
- [Find a Glass Specialist](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/glass-glazing): Windows and glass features
- [Find a Painter](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/painter): Interior and exterior painting
- [Find a Tiler](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/tiler): Floor and wall tile installation
- [Find a Carpenter](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/carpenter): Custom woodwork and structures
- [Find a Furniture Maker](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/furniture-maker): Custom Balinese furniture
- [Find a Landscaper](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/find/landscaper): Tropical garden design

## Find by Location

- [Builders in Canggu](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/builders/canggu): Popular expat area
- [Builders in Ubud](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/builders/ubud): Cultural heart of Bali
- [Builders in Seminyak](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/builders/seminyak): Upscale beach area
- [Builders in Uluwatu](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/builders/uluwatu): Clifftop properties
- [Builders in Sanur](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/builders/sanur): Calm beach community
- [Builders in Denpasar](https://ratemybalibuilder.com/builders/denpasar): Capital city

## Key Information

### How It Works
1. Search for a builder by name or phone number
2. See their status: Recommended, Unknown, or Flagged
3. Read reviews from previous clients
4. Make an informed decision before hiring

### What We Verify
- Builder contact information
- Client review authenticity
- Project completion claims
- Red flags and scam reports

### Common Bali Construction Questions
- Building costs range from $600-1500 USD per square meter
- Always check reviews before paying deposits
- Get written contracts with payment schedules
- Verify builder credentials and past projects
